summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Alley between Eastlake Avenue and Melrose Avenue from East Denny Way to East Thomas Street in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer under Ordinance No. 22777, creating Local Improvement District No. 2230 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
